title: ∙ Barack Obama at the celebration of the sixtieth anniversary of the Korean war
subtitle: It is alleged that the picture shows that President Obama does not salute the flag while playing the American national anthem at the 2013 Korean War anniversary ceremony.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The picture shows that President Obama does not salute the flag while playing the American national anthem at the anniversary of the 2013 Korean War.
